problem_text: In Fig. 23-54, a solid sphere of radius $a=2.00 \mathrm{~cm}$ is concentric with a spherical conducting shell of inner radius $b=2.00 a$ and outer radius $c=$ $2.40 a$. The sphere has a net uniform charge $q_1=+5.00 \mathrm{fC}$; the shell has a net charge $q_2=-q_1$. What is the magnitude of the electric field at radial distance $r=0$?
